akas: Something About 1 Percent World-wide (English title) (alternative spelling)
One Percent of Anything World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
One Percent of Something World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Something About 1 Percent World-wide (English title) (alternative spelling)
One Percent of Anything World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
One Percent of Something World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: From Destiny to Fate, 1 Percent Chance of Love
1.plot: One Percent of Something Ha Suk Jin (Let's Drink, The Woman Who Married Three Times) and Jun So Min (Maids, Secret Investigation Record) star in a romantic comedy that proves the greatest wealth you can inherit is finding someone you love. Lee Jae In (Ha Suk Jin) is an entitled third-generation chaebol.

2.title: Match Point. I Don't Play Losing Games
2.plot: Jae In negotiates his grandfather down to just dating Kim Da Hyun for six months in order to secure his position. The problem is that Da Hyun still isn't convinced.

3.title: A Problematic Man; 'This is cheating, you know.'
3.plot: Jae In and Da Hyun solidify their agreement and draw up a contract, followed by their first official date.

4.title: Business Relationship; 'You'd Better Not Fall For Me!'
4.plot: Chairman Lee is eager to hear news about the relationship, but the rest of the family are not too happy.

5.title: Just Like Everyone Else; 'Starting To Do Things I've Never Done'
5.plot: Jae In decides that if he is really going to date Da Hyun, he needs to step his game up and do the things other couples do.

6.title: Spending Time Together In Our Busy Lives
6.plot: A bomb scare keeps Jae In from keeping his date with Da Hyun, making her reevaluate her feelings about their relationship.

7.title: The Meaning of a Gift From a Mere Memory to a Treasured One
7.plot: It is Jae In's birthday, and their awkward relationship makes finding the right gift a nightmare for Da Hyun.

8.title: A Confession of Sorts; 'Stay here. At my house. By my side.'
8.plot: A robbery at Da Hyun's apartment forces her to stay at Jae In's place, further clouding her mind with temptation.

9.title: Jealousy Is An Unexpected Emotion I've Never Felt Before
9.plot: An old paramour of Jae In drops in to make a business proposal, and Da Hyun doesn't like it.

10.title: Hate-Love - 'Should I Spare Them?'
10.plot: Both Da Hyun and Jae In face obstacles from outside their relationship that make trusting their partner hard.

11.title: Do you want to see this through until the end, even though it may be hard?
11.plot: Da Hyun formally meets Min Tae Ha, and Jae In is forced to fess up about hiding the last page of his dating contract.

12.title: Her Absence - It Feels Like My Heart Is Going To Disappear
12.plot: Da Hyun disappears when a shadowy figure decides Min Tae Ha deserves to inherit SH Group.

13.title: The End of the Contract
13.plot: After the kidnapping, Da Hyun must deal with her PTSD, and Jae In vows to exact revenge on the kidnapper.

14.title: A Lie 'Will time really heal me?'
14.plot: The last day of their contracted dating passes, and the couple separates.

15.title: I Love You - The True Feelings That He Revealed Too Late
15.plot: Da Hyun and Jae In deal with being apart, and going on blind dates.

16.title: One Percent of Luck - The Person Who Makes Me Perfect
16.plot: In the finale, Jae In and Da Hyun must navigate their remaining obstacles in order to marry each other.

imdb.plot outline: The story that begins when the female protagonist saved a very old but rich man. Then the old man named the woman as the sole beneficiary of all his wealth. His grandson on the other hand wanting to get the inheritance made a deal with his grandpa to date that woman but with a contract that comes with a price as well. How will each other endure their differences? Will they continue their love story or end it just how it is supposed to be?
imdb.title: Something About 1%
plot: A kind school teacher suddenly becomes heir to a large company on the condition she marries the owner's grandson. As she is interested in neither, they make a deal that if they manage to date for a full six months, he will inherit instead.::Dama del Puente

The story that begins when the female protagonist saved a very old but rich man. Then the old man named the woman as the sole beneficiary of all his wealth. His grandson on the other hand wanting to get the inheritance made a deal with his grandpa to date that woman but with a contract that comes with a price as well. How will each other endure their differences? Will they continue their love story or end it just how it is supposed to be?

One day, Kim Da Hyun, a kind elementary school teacher, helps an old man get to the hospital, saving his life. Unknown to her, he's the owner of a large company and moved by her compassion, he names her his heir on the condition she marries his grandson, Lee Jae In. Upon learning of this, Lee Jae In, a handsome and arrogant business man, seeks her to resolve the matter. Neither of them is happy with the extravagant conditions, as Jae In refuses to see his family's legacy go to an undeserving stranger and Da Hyun is uninterested in inheriting a company at all, plus neither can stand each other and deem marriage impossible. As such, they manage to have the grandfather alter the conditions: if they manage to date for a full six months, then Lee Jae In will be able to inherit. But even six months seem unlikely, when they are two contrasting people that lead such different lives.::Dama del Puente
